mdRecord.dcterms:title: Scott Stadium with Band shelter
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Thompson, Ralph R.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Notation on back, "Band shelter at Scott Stadium, Charlottesville, where the Virginia Music Festival will present three concerts Friday, Saturday, and Sunday evenings with the National Symphony Orchestra, conducted by Hans Kindler, and soloists. Here the Charlottesville Municipal Band tests the newly built shell in the University of Virginia's football stadium where ten thousand seats will be available for music lover this weekend."
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: University of Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: University of Virginia Visual History Collection
